about_the_game:
A collection of digital 'dakimakura' images featuring the characters from the game.

Includes;
- Lingerie & Nude version of character 'Mira'
- Lingerie & Nude version of character 'Senpai'
- Lingerie & Nude version of character 'Jasmin'
- Lingerie & Nude version of character 'Rias'
- Lingerie & Nude version of character 'Melissa'

The images included are super high resolution images (3300 x 5000 pixels) and fully uncensored.
All characters depicted are at least 18 years of age or older.

content_descriptors.notes: DLC includes nude illustrations of female characters.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Roomie Romance - Dakimakuras

pc_requirements.recommended:
